post.summary:
RegisterERC20 defines a governance operation for registering a token pair
for the specified erc20 contract. The authority is hard-coded to the Cosmos
SDK x/gov module account

parameters.description:
MsgRegisterERC20 is the Msg/RegisterERC20 request type for registering
an Erc20 contract token pair.
parameters.name: body

post.summary:
ToggleConversion defines a governance operation for enabling/disabling a
token pair conversion. The authority is hard-coded to the Cosmos SDK x/gov
module account

parameters.description:
MsgToggleConversion is the Msg/MsgToggleConversion request type for toggling
an Erc20 contract conversion capability.
parameters.name: body

post.summary:
UpdateParams defines a governance operation for updating the x/erc20 module
parameters. The authority is hard-coded to the Cosmos SDK x/gov module
account

UpdateParams defined a governance operation for updating the x/feemarket
module parameters. The authority is hard-coded to the Cosmos SDK x/gov
module account

parameters.description: MsgUpdateParams defines a Msg for updating the x/feemarket module parameters.
parameters.name: body

post.summary:
RegisterPreinstalls defines a governance operation for directly registering
preinstalled contracts in the EVM. The authority is the same as is used for
Params updates.

parameters.description: MsgRegisterPreinstalls defines a Msg for creating preinstalls in evm state.
parameters.name: body

post.summary:
UpdateParams defined a governance operation for updating the x/vm module
parameters. The authority is hard-coded to the Cosmos SDK x/gov module
account

parameters.description: MsgUpdateParams defines a Msg for updating the x/vm module parameters.
parameters.name: body

get.summary: Params retrieves the erc20 module params
TokenPairs retrieves registered token pairs (mappings)x

parameters.description:
key is a value returned in PageResponse.next_key to begin
querying the next page most efficiently. Only one of offset or key
should be set.
parameters.name: pagination.key

parameters.description:
offset is a numeric offset that can be used when key is unavailable.
It is less efficient than using key. Only one of offset or key should
be set.
parameters.name: pagination.offset

parameters.description:
limit is the total number of results to be returned in the result page.
If left empty it will default to a value to be set by each app.
parameters.name: pagination.limit

parameters.description:
count_total is set to true  to indicate that the result set should include
a count of the total number of items available for pagination in UIs.
count_total is only respected when offset is used. It is ignored when key
is set.
parameters.name: pagination.count_total

parameters.description:
reverse is set to true if results are to be returned in the descending order.

Since: cosmos-sdk 0.43
parameters.name: pagination.reverse

get.summary: TokenPair retrieves a registered token pair (mapping)

parameters.description:
token identifier can be either the hex contract address of the ERC20 or the
Cosmos base denomination
parameters.name: token

get.summary:
ConvertCoin mints a ERC20 token representation of the native Cosmos coin
that is registered on the token mapping.

parameters.description: receiver is the hex address to receive ERC20 token
parameters.name: receiver

parameters.description:
sender is the cosmos bech32 address from the owner of the given Cosmos
coins
parameters.name: sender

get.summary:
ConvertERC20 mints a native Cosmos coin representation of the ERC20 token
contract that is registered on the token mapping.

parameters.description:
contract_address of an ERC20 token contract, that is registered in a token
pair
parameters.name: contract_address

parameters.description: amount of ERC20 tokens to convert
parameters.name: amount

parameters.description: receiver is the bech32 address to receive native Cosmos coins
parameters.name: receiver

parameters.description: sender is the hex address from the owner of the given ERC20 tokens
parameters.name: sender

get.summary: BaseFee queries the base fee of the parent block of the current block.
BlockGas queries the gas used at a given block height
Params queries the parameters of x/feemarket module.

FractionalBalance returns only the fractional balance of an address. This
does not include any integer balance.

parameters.description: address is the account address to query  fractional balance for.
parameters.name: address

get.summary:
Remainder returns the amount backed by the reserve, but not yet owned by
any account, i.e. not in circulation.
Account queries an Ethereum account.

parameters.description: address is the ethereum hex address to query the account for.
parameters.name: address

get.summary:
Balance queries the balance of a the EVM denomination for a single
account.

parameters.description: address is the ethereum hex address to query the balance for.
parameters.name: address

get.summary:
BaseFee queries the base fee of the parent block of the current block,
it's similar to feemarket module's method, but also checks london hardfork
status.
Code queries the balance of all coins for a single account.

parameters.description: address is the ethereum hex address to query the code for.
parameters.name: address

get.summary: Config queries the EVM configuration
CosmosAccount queries an Ethereum account's Cosmos Address.

parameters.description: address is the ethereum hex address to query the account for.
parameters.name: address

get.summary: EstimateGas implements the `eth_estimateGas` rpc api

parameters.description: args uses the same json format as the json rpc api.
parameters.name: args

parameters.description: gas_cap defines the default gas cap to be used
parameters.name: gas_cap

parameters.description: proposer_address of the requested block in hex format
parameters.name: proposer_address

parameters.description: chain_id is the eip155 chain id parsed from the requested block header
parameters.name: chain_id

get.summary: EthCall implements the `eth_call` rpc api

parameters.description: args uses the same json format as the json rpc api.
parameters.name: args

parameters.description: gas_cap defines the default gas cap to be used
parameters.name: gas_cap

parameters.description: proposer_address of the requested block in hex format
parameters.name: proposer_address

parameters.description: chain_id is the eip155 chain id parsed from the requested block header
parameters.name: chain_id

post.summary: EthereumTx defines a method submitting Ethereum transactions.

parameters.description:
from is the bytes of ethereum signer address. This address value is checked
against the address derived from the signature (V, R, S) using the
secp256k1 elliptic curve
parameters.name: from

parameters.description: raw is the raw ethereum transaction
parameters.name: raw

get.summary:
GlobalMinGasPrice queries the MinGasPrice
it's similar to feemarket module's method,
but makes the conversion to 18 decimals
when the evm denom is represented with a different precision.
Params queries the parameters of x/vm module.
Storage queries the balance of all coins for a single account.

parameters.description: address is the ethereum hex address to query the storage state for.
parameters.name: address

parameters.description: key defines the key of the storage state
parameters.name: key

get.summary:
TraceBlock implements the `debug_traceBlockByNumber` and
`debug_traceBlockByHash` rpc api

parameters.description: tracer is a custom javascript tracer
parameters.name: trace_config.tracer

parameters.description:
timeout overrides the default timeout of 5 seconds for JavaScript-based
tracing calls
parameters.name: trace_config.timeout

parameters.description: reexec defines the number of blocks the tracer is willing to go back
parameters.name: trace_config.reexec

parameters.description: disable_stack switches stack capture
parameters.name: trace_config.disable_stack

parameters.description: disable_storage switches storage capture
parameters.name: trace_config.disable_storage

parameters.description: debug can be used to print output during capture end
parameters.name: trace_config.debug

parameters.description: limit defines the maximum length of output, but zero means unlimited
parameters.name: trace_config.limit

parameters.description: homestead_block switch (nil no fork, 0 = already homestead)
parameters.name: trace_config.overrides.homestead_block

parameters.description: dao_fork_block corresponds to TheDAO hard-fork switch block (nil no fork)
parameters.name: trace_config.overrides.dao_fork_block

parameters.description:
dao_fork_support defines whether the nodes supports or opposes the DAO
hard-fork
parameters.name: trace_config.overrides.dao_fork_support

parameters.description:
eip150_block: EIP150 implements the Gas price changes
(https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/150) EIP150 HF block (nil no fork)
parameters.name: trace_config.overrides.eip150_block

parameters.description: eip155_block: EIP155Block HF block
parameters.name: trace_config.overrides.eip155_block

parameters.description: eip158_block: EIP158 HF block
parameters.name: trace_config.overrides.eip158_block

parameters.description:
byzantium_block: Byzantium switch block (nil no fork, 0 = already on
byzantium)
parameters.name: trace_config.overrides.byzantium_block

parameters.description:
constantinople_block: Constantinople switch block (nil no fork, 0 = already
activated)
parameters.name: trace_config.overrides.constantinople_block

parameters.description: petersburg_block: Petersburg switch block (nil same as Constantinople)
parameters.name: trace_config.overrides.petersburg_block

parameters.description:
istanbul_block: Istanbul switch block (nil no fork, 0 = already on
istanbul)
parameters.name: trace_config.overrides.istanbul_block

parameters.description:
muir_glacier_block: Eip-2384 (bomb delay) switch block (nil no fork, 0 =
already activated)
parameters.name: trace_config.overrides.muir_glacier_block

parameters.description: berlin_block: Berlin switch block (nil = no fork, 0 = already on berlin)
parameters.name: trace_config.overrides.berlin_block

parameters.description: london_block: London switch block (nil = no fork, 0 = already on london)
parameters.name: trace_config.overrides.london_block

parameters.description:
arrow_glacier_block: Eip-4345 (bomb delay) switch block (nil = no fork, 0 =
already activated)
parameters.name: trace_config.overrides.arrow_glacier_block

parameters.description:
gray_glacier_block: EIP-5133 (bomb delay) switch block (nil = no fork, 0 =
already activated)
parameters.name: trace_config.overrides.gray_glacier_block

parameters.description:
merge_netsplit_block: Virtual fork after The Merge to use as a network
splitter
parameters.name: trace_config.overrides.merge_netsplit_block

parameters.description: chain_id is the id of the chain (EIP-155)
parameters.name: trace_config.overrides.chain_id

parameters.description: denom is the denomination used on the EVM
parameters.name: trace_config.overrides.denom

parameters.description: decimals is the real decimal precision of the denomination used on the EVM
parameters.name: trace_config.overrides.decimals

parameters.description:
shanghai_time: Shanghai switch time (nil = no fork, 0 = already on
shanghai)
parameters.name: trace_config.overrides.shanghai_time

parameters.description: cancun_time: Cancun switch time (nil = no fork, 0 = already on cancun)
parameters.name: trace_config.overrides.cancun_time

parameters.description: prague_time: Prague switch time (nil = no fork, 0 = already on prague)
parameters.name: trace_config.overrides.prague_time

parameters.description: verkle_time: Verkle switch time (nil = no fork, 0 = already on verkle)
parameters.name: trace_config.overrides.verkle_time

parameters.description: osaka_time: Osaka switch time (nil = no fork, 0 = already on osaka)
parameters.name: trace_config.overrides.osaka_time

parameters.description: enable_memory switches memory capture
parameters.name: trace_config.enable_memory

parameters.description: enable_return_data switches the capture of return data
parameters.name: trace_config.enable_return_data

parameters.description: tracer_json_config configures the tracer using a JSON string
parameters.name: trace_config.tracer_json_config

parameters.description: block_number of the traced block
parameters.name: block_number

parameters.description: block_hash (hex) of the traced block
parameters.name: block_hash

parameters.description: block_time of the traced block
parameters.name: block_time

parameters.description: proposer_address is the address of the requested block
parameters.name: proposer_address

parameters.description: chain_id is the eip155 chain id parsed from the requested block header
parameters.name: chain_id

parameters.description: block_max_gas of the traced block
parameters.name: block_max_gas

parameters.description:
merge_netsplit_block: Virtual fork after The Merge to use as a network

get.summary:
ValidatorAccount queries an Ethereum account's from a validator consensus
Address.

parameters.description: cons_address is the validator cons address to query the account for.
parameters.name: cons_address

post.summary:
AddCodeUploadParamsAddresses defines a governance operation for
adding addresses to code upload params.
The authority is defined in the keeper.

parameters.description:
MsgAddCodeUploadParamsAddresses is the
MsgAddCodeUploadParamsAddresses request type.
parameters.name: body

post.summary: ClearAdmin removes any admin stored for a smart contract
Execute submits the given message data to a smart contract

InstantiateContract creates a new smart contract instance for the given
 code id.

parameters.description:
MsgInstantiateContract create a new smart contract instance for the given
code id.
parameters.name: body

post.summary:
InstantiateContract2 creates a new smart contract instance for the given
 code id with a predictable address

parameters.description:
MsgInstantiateContract2 create a new smart contract instance for the given
code id with a predictable address.
parameters.name: body

post.summary: Migrate runs a code upgrade/ downgrade for a smart contract

PinCodes defines a governance operation for pinning a set of
code ids in the wasmvm cache. The authority is defined in the keeper.

parameters.description:
MsgPinCodes is the MsgPinCodes request type.

Since: 0.40
parameters.name: body

post.summary:
RemoveCodeUploadParamsAddresses defines a governance operation for
removing addresses from code upload params.
The authority is defined in the keeper.

parameters.description:
MsgRemoveCodeUploadParamsAddresses is the
MsgRemoveCodeUploadParamsAddresses request type.
parameters.name: body

post.summary:
StoreAndInstantiateContract defines a governance operation for storing
and instantiating the contract. The authority is defined in the keeper.

parameters.description:
MsgStoreAndInstantiateContract is the MsgStoreAndInstantiateContract
request type.

Since: 0.40
parameters.name: body

post.summary:
StoreAndMigrateContract defines a governance operation for storing
and migrating the contract. The authority is defined in the keeper.

parameters.description:
MsgStoreAndMigrateContract is the MsgStoreAndMigrateContract
request type.

Since: 0.42
parameters.name: body

post.summary: StoreCode to submit Wasm code to the system

SudoContract defines a governance operation for calling sudo
on a contract. The authority is defined in the keeper.

parameters.description:
MsgSudoContract is the MsgSudoContract request type.

Since: 0.40
parameters.name: body

post.summary:
UnpinCodes defines a governance operation for unpinning a set of
code ids in the wasmvm cache. The authority is defined in the keeper.

parameters.description:
MsgUnpinCodes is the MsgUnpinCodes request type.

Since: 0.40
parameters.name: body

post.summary: UpdateAdmin sets a new admin for a smart contract
UpdateContractLabel sets a new label for a smart contract
UpdateInstantiateConfig updates instantiate config for a smart contract

UpdateParams defines a governance operation for updating the x/wasm
module parameters. The authority is defined in the keeper.

parameters.description:
MsgUpdateParams is the MsgUpdateParams request type.

Since: 0.40
parameters.name: body

get.summary: Codes gets the metadata for all stored wasm codes

parameters.description:
key is a value returned in PageResponse.next_key to begin
querying the next page most efficiently. Only one of offset or key
should be set.
parameters.name: pagination.key

parameters.description:
offset is a numeric offset that can be used when key is unavailable.
It is less efficient than using key. Only one of offset or key should
be set.
parameters.name: pagination.offset

parameters.description:
limit is the total number of results to be returned in the result page.
If left empty it will default to a value to be set by each app.
parameters.name: pagination.limit

parameters.description:
count_total is set to true  to indicate that the result set should include
a count of the total number of items available for pagination in UIs.
count_total is only respected when offset is used. It is ignored when key
is set.
parameters.name: pagination.count_total

parameters.description:
reverse is set to true if results are to be returned in the descending order.

Since: cosmos-sdk 0.43
parameters.name: pagination.reverse

get.summary: CodeInfo gets the metadata for a single wasm code

parameters.description: grpc-gateway_out does not support Go style CodeID
parameters.name: code_id

get.summary: Code gets the binary code and metadata for a single wasm code

parameters.description: grpc-gateway_out does not support Go style CodeID
parameters.name: code_id

count_total is set to true  to indicate that the result set should include

count_total is only respected when offset is used. It is ignored when key

parameters.name: pagination.count_total

parameters.description:

offset is a numeric offset that can be used when key is unavailable.

parameters.description:
limit is the total number of results to be returned in the result page.
If left empty it will default to a value to be set by each app.
parameters.name: pagination.limit

parameters.description:
count_total is set to true  to indicate that the result set should include
a count of the total number of items available for pagination in UIs.
count_total is only respected when offset is used. It is ignored when key
is set.
parameters.name: pagination.count_total

parameters.description:
reverse is set to true if results are to be returned in the descending order.

Since: cosmos-sdk 0.43
parameters.name: pagination.reverse

get.summary:
WasmLimitsConfig gets the configured limits for static validation of Wasm
files, encoded in JSON.
Parameters queries the parameters of the module.

post.summary:
UpdateParams defines a (governance) operation for updating the module
parameters. The authority defaults to the x/gov module account.

parameters.description: MsgUpdateParams is the Msg/UpdateParams request type.
parameters.name: body

cosmos.base.query.v1beta1.PageRequest.title:
PageRequest is to be embedded in gRPC request messages for efficient
pagination. Ex:

count_total.description:
count_total is set to true  to indicate that the result set should include
a count of the total number of items available for pagination in UIs.
count_total is only respected when offset is used. It is ignored when key
is set.

key.description:
key is a value returned in PageResponse.next_key to begin
querying the next page most efficiently. Only one of offset or key
should be set.

limit.description:
limit is the total number of results to be returned in the result page.
If left empty it will default to a value to be set by each app.

offset.description:
offset is a numeric offset that can be used when key is unavailable.
It is less efficient than using key. Only one of offset or key should
be set.

reverse.description:
reverse is set to true if results are to be returned in the descending order.

Since: cosmos-sdk 0.43

next_key.description:
next_key is the key to be passed to PageRequest.key to
query the next page most efficiently. It will be empty if
there are no more results.

total.title:
total is total number of results available if PageRequest.count_total
was set, its value is undefined otherwise

cosmos.base.v1beta1.Coin.description:
Coin defines a token with a denomination and an amount.

NOTE: The amount field is an Int which implements the custom method
signatures required by gogoproto.

cosmos.evm.erc20.v1.MsgRegisterERC20.description:
MsgRegisterERC20 is the Msg/RegisterERC20 request type for registering
an Erc20 contract token pair.

erc20addresses.title: erc20addresses is a slice of ERC20 token contract hex addresses

signer.title: signer is the address registering the erc20 pairs

cosmos.evm.erc20.v1.MsgRegisterERC20Resp.description:
MsgRegisterERC20Response defines the response structure for executing a
MsgRegisterERC20 message.

cosmos.evm.erc20.v1.MsgToggleConversion.description:
MsgToggleConversion is the Msg/MsgToggleConversion request type for toggling
an Erc20 contract conversion capability.

authority.description: authority is the address of the governance account.

token.title:
token identifier can be either the hex contract address of the ERC20 or the
Cosmos base denomination

cosmos.evm.erc20.v1.MsgToggleConversionR.description:
MsgToggleConversionResponse defines the response structure for executing a
ToggleConversion message.

cosmos.evm.erc20.v1.MsgUpdateParams.title:
MsgUpdateParams is the Msg/UpdateParams request type for Erc20 parameters.
Since: cosmos-sdk 0.47

authority.description: authority is the address of the governance account.

params.description:
params defines the x/vm parameters to update.
NOTE: All parameters must be supplied.

cosmos.evm.erc20.v1.MsgUpdateParamsRespo.title:
MsgUpdateParamsResponse defines the response structure for executing a
MsgUpdateParams message.
Since: cosmos-sdk 0.47

cosmos.evm.erc20.v1.Owner.description:
Owner enumerates the ownership of a ERC20 contract.

 - OWNER_UNSPECIFIED: OWNER_UNSPECIFIED defines an invalid/undefined owner.
 - OWNER_MODULE: OWNER_MODULE - erc20 is owned by the erc20 module account.
 - OWNER_EXTERNAL: OWNER_EXTERNAL - erc20 is owned by an external account.

cosmos.evm.erc20.v1.Params.title: Params defines the erc20 module params

enable_erc20.description:
enable_erc20 is the parameter to enable the conversion of Cosmos coins <-->
ERC20 tokens.

permissionless_registration.title:
permissionless_registration is the parameter that allows ERC20s to be
permissionlessly registered to be converted to bank tokens and vice versa

cosmos.evm.erc20.v1.QueryParamsResponse.description:
QueryParamsResponse is the response type for the Query/Params RPC
method.

params.title: params are the erc20 module parameters

cosmos.evm.erc20.v1.QueryTokenPairRespon.description:
QueryTokenPairResponse is the response type for the Query/TokenPair RPC
method.

token_pair.title:
token_pairs returns the info about a registered token pair for the erc20
module

cosmos.evm.erc20.v1.QueryTokenPairsRespo.description:
QueryTokenPairsResponse is the response type for the Query/TokenPairs RPC
method.

pagination.description: pagination defines the pagination in the response.

token_pairs.title: token_pairs is a slice of registered token pairs for the erc20 module

cosmos.evm.erc20.v1.TokenPair.description:
TokenPair defines an instance that records a pairing (mapping) consisting of a native
Cosmos Coin and an ERC20 token address. The "pair" does not imply an asset swap exchange.

contract_owner.title:
contract_owner is the an ENUM specifying the type of ERC20 owner (0
invalid, 1 ModuleAccount, 2 external address)

denom.title: denom defines the cosmos base denomination to be mapped to

enabled.title: enabled defines the token mapping enable status

erc20_address.title: erc20_address is the hex address of ERC20 contract token

cosmos.evm.feemarket.v1.MsgUpdateParams.description: MsgUpdateParams defines a Msg for updating the x/feemarket module parameters.

authority.description: authority is the address of the governance account.

params.description:
params defines the x/feemarket parameters to update.
NOTE: All parameters must be supplied.

cosmos.evm.feemarket.v1.MsgUpdateParamsR.description:
MsgUpdateParamsResponse defines the response structure for executing a
MsgUpdateParams message.

cosmos.evm.feemarket.v1.Params.title: Params defines the EVM module parameters

base_fee_change_denominator.description:
base_fee_change_denominator bounds the amount the base fee can change
between blocks.

elasticity_multiplier.description:
elasticity_multiplier bounds the maximum gas limit an EIP-1559 block may
have.

enable_height.description:
enable_height defines at which block height the base fee calculation is
enabled.

min_gas_multiplier.title:
min_gas_multiplier bounds the minimum gas used to be charged
to senders based on gas limit

min_gas_price.title:
min_gas_price defines the minimum gas price value for cosmos and eth
transactions

no_base_fee.title: no_base_fee forces the EIP-1559 base fee to 0 (needed for 0 price calls)

cosmos.evm.feemarket.v1.QueryBaseFeeResp.description: QueryBaseFeeResponse returns the EIP1559 base fee.

base_fee.title: base_fee is the EIP1559 base fee

cosmos.evm.feemarket.v1.QueryBlockGasRes.description: QueryBlockGasResponse returns block gas used for a given height.

gas.title: gas is the returned block gas

cosmos.evm.feemarket.v1.QueryParamsRespo.description: QueryParamsResponse defines the response type for querying x/vm parameters.

params.description: params define the evm module parameters.

cosmos.evm.precisebank.v1.QueryFractiona.description:
QueryFractionalBalanceResponse defines the response type for
Query/FractionalBalance method.

fractional_balance.description: fractional_balance is the fractional balance of the address.

cosmos.evm.precisebank.v1.QueryRemainder.description: QueryRemainderResponse defines the response type for Query/Remainder method.

remainder.description:
remainder is the amount backed by the reserve, but not yet owned by any
account, i.e. not in circulation.

cosmos.evm.vm.v1.AccessControl.title:
AccessControl defines the permission policy of the EVM
for creating and calling contracts

call.title: call defines the permission policy for calling contracts

create.title: create defines the permission policy for creating contracts

cosmos.evm.vm.v1.AccessControlType.title: AccessControlType defines the permission type for policies

access_control_list.title:
access_control_list defines defines different things depending on the
AccessType:
- ACCESS_TYPE_PERMISSIONLESS: list of addresses that are blocked from
performing the operation
- ACCESS_TYPE_RESTRICTED: ignored
- ACCESS_TYPE_PERMISSIONED: list of addresses that are allowed to perform
the operation

access_type.title: access_type defines which type of permission is required for the operation

cosmos.evm.vm.v1.AccessType.description:
- ACCESS_TYPE_PERMISSIONLESS: ACCESS_TYPE_PERMISSIONLESS does not restrict the operation to anyone
 - ACCESS_TYPE_RESTRICTED: ACCESS_TYPE_RESTRICTED restrict the operation to anyone
 - ACCESS_TYPE_PERMISSIONED: ACCESS_TYPE_PERMISSIONED only allows the operation for specific addresses
cosmos.evm.vm.v1.AccessType.title: AccessType defines the types of permissions for the operations

cosmos.evm.vm.v1.ChainConfig.description:
ChainConfig defines the Ethereum ChainConfig parameters using *sdk.Int values
instead of *big.Int.

arrow_glacier_block.title:
arrow_glacier_block: Eip-4345 (bomb delay) switch block (nil = no fork, 0 =
already activated)

berlin_block.title: berlin_block: Berlin switch block (nil = no fork, 0 = already on berlin)

byzantium_block.title:
byzantium_block: Byzantium switch block (nil no fork, 0 = already on
byzantium)

cancun_time.title: cancun_time: Cancun switch time (nil = no fork, 0 = already on cancun)

chain_id.title: chain_id is the id of the chain (EIP-155)

constantinople_block.title:
constantinople_block: Constantinople switch block (nil no fork, 0 = already
activated)

dao_fork_block.title: dao_fork_block corresponds to TheDAO hard-fork switch block (nil no fork)

dao_fork_support.title:
dao_fork_support defines whether the nodes supports or opposes the DAO
hard-fork

decimals.title: decimals is the real decimal precision of the denomination used on the EVM

denom.title: denom is the denomination used on the EVM

eip150_block.title:
eip150_block: EIP150 implements the Gas price changes
(https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/150) EIP150 HF block (nil no fork)

gray_glacier_block.title:
gray_glacier_block: EIP-5133 (bomb delay) switch block (nil = no fork, 0 =
already activated)

homestead_block.title: homestead_block switch (nil no fork, 0 = already homestead)

istanbul_block.title:
istanbul_block: Istanbul switch block (nil no fork, 0 = already on
istanbul)

london_block.title: london_block: London switch block (nil = no fork, 0 = already on london)

merge_netsplit_block.title:
merge_netsplit_block: Virtual fork after The Merge to use as a network
splitter

muir_glacier_block.title:
muir_glacier_block: Eip-2384 (bomb delay) switch block (nil no fork, 0 =
already activated)

osaka_time.title: osaka_time: Osaka switch time (nil = no fork, 0 = already on osaka)

petersburg_block.title: petersburg_block: Petersburg switch block (nil same as Constantinople)

prague_time.title: prague_time: Prague switch time (nil = no fork, 0 = already on prague)

shanghai_time.title:
shanghai_time: Shanghai switch time (nil = no fork, 0 = already on
shanghai)

verkle_time.title: verkle_time: Verkle switch time (nil = no fork, 0 = already on verkle)

ret.title:
ret is the returned data from evm function (result or data supplied with
revert opcode)

vm_error.title: vm_error is the error returned by vm execution

cosmos.evm.vm.v1.Log.description:
Log represents an protobuf compatible Ethereum Log that defines a contract
log event. These events are generated by the LOG opcode and stored/indexed by
the node.

NOTE: address, topics and data are consensus fields. The rest of the fields
are derived, i.e. filled in by the nodes, but not secured by consensus.

address.title: address of the contract that generated the event

block_hash.title: block_hash of the block in which the transaction was included

block_number.title: block_number of the block in which the transaction was included

data.title: data which is supplied by the contract, usually ABI-encoded

index.title: index of the log in the block

removed.description:
removed is true if this log was reverted due to a chain
reorganisation. You must pay attention to this field if you receive logs
through a filter query.

topics.description: topics is a list of topics provided by the contract.

tx_index.title: tx_index of the transaction in the block

cosmos.evm.vm.v1.MsgEthereumTx.description: MsgEthereumTx encapsulates an Ethereum transaction as an SDK message.

from.title:
from is the bytes of ethereum signer address. This address value is checked
against the address derived from the signature (V, R, S) using the
secp256k1 elliptic curve

raw.title: raw is the raw ethereum transaction

cosmos.evm.vm.v1.MsgEthereumTxResponse.description: MsgEthereumTxResponse defines the Msg/EthereumTx response type.

gas_used.title: gas_used specifies how much gas was consumed by the transaction

hash.title:
hash of the ethereum transaction in hex format. This hash differs from the
CometBFT sha256 hash of the transaction bytes. See
https://github.com/tendermint/tendermint/issues/6539 for reference

logs.description:
logs contains the transaction hash and the proto-compatible ethereum
logs.

ret.title:
ret is the returned data from evm function (result or data supplied with
revert opcode)

vm_error.title: vm_error is the error returned by vm execution

cosmos.evm.vm.v1.MsgRegisterPreinstalls.description: MsgRegisterPreinstalls defines a Msg for creating preinstalls in evm state.

authority.description: authority is the address of the governance account.

preinstalls.description: preinstalls defines the preinstalls to create.

cosmos.evm.vm.v1.MsgRegisterPreinstallsR.description:
MsgRegisterPreinstallsResponse defines the response structure for executing a
MsgRegisterPreinstalls message.

cosmos.evm.vm.v1.MsgUpdateParams.description: MsgUpdateParams defines a Msg for updating the x/vm module parameters.

authority.description: authority is the address of the governance account.

params.description:
params defines the x/vm parameters to update.
NOTE: All parameters must be supplied.

cosmos.evm.vm.v1.MsgUpdateParamsResponse.description:
MsgUpdateParamsResponse defines the response structure for executing a
MsgUpdateParams message.

cosmos.evm.vm.v1.Params.title: Params defines the EVM module parameters

access_control.title: access_control defines the permission policy of the EVM

active_static_precompiles.title:
active_static_precompiles defines the slice of hex addresses of the
precompiled contracts that are active

evm_channels.title: evm_channels is the list of channel identifiers from EVM compatible chains

evm_denom.description:
evm_denom represents the token denomination used to run the EVM state
transitions.

extra_eips.title: extra_eips defines the additional EIPs for the vm.Config

cosmos.evm.vm.v1.Preinstall.title:
Preinstall defines a contract that is preinstalled on-chain with a specific
contract address and bytecode

address.title: address in hex format of the preinstall contract

code.title: code in hex format for the preinstall contract

cosmos.evm.vm.v1.QueryAccountResponse.description: QueryAccountResponse is the response type for the Query/Account RPC method.

balance.description: balance is the balance of the EVM denomination.

code_hash.description: code_hash is the hex-formatted code bytes from the EOA.

nonce.description: nonce is the account's sequence number.

cosmos.evm.vm.v1.QueryBalanceResponse.description: QueryBalanceResponse is the response type for the Query/Balance RPC method.

balance.description: balance is the balance of the EVM denomination.

cosmos.evm.vm.v1.QueryBaseFeeResponse.description: QueryBaseFeeResponse returns the EIP1559 base fee.

base_fee.title: base_fee is the EIP1559 base fee

cosmos.evm.vm.v1.QueryCodeResponse.description:
QueryCodeResponse is the response type for the Query/Code RPC
method.

code.description: code represents the code bytes from an ethereum address.

cosmos.evm.vm.v1.QueryCosmosAccountRespo.description:
QueryCosmosAccountResponse is the response type for the Query/CosmosAccount
RPC method.

cosmos_address.description: cosmos_address is the cosmos address of the account.

sequence.description: sequence is the account's sequence number.

cosmos.evm.vm.v1.QueryParamsResponse.description: QueryParamsResponse defines the response type for querying x/vm parameters.

params.description: params define the evm module parameters.

cosmos.evm.vm.v1.QueryStorageResponse.description:
QueryStorageResponse is the response type for the Query/Storage RPC
method.

value.description: value defines the storage state value hash associated with the given key.

data.title: data is the response serialized in bytes
data is the response serialized in bytes

cosmos.evm.vm.v1.QueryValidatorAccountRe.description:
QueryValidatorAccountResponse is the response type for the
Query/ValidatorAccount RPC method.

account_address.description: account_address is the cosmos address of the account in bech32 format.

sequence.description: sequence is the account's sequence number.

cosmos.evm.vm.v1.TraceConfig.description: TraceConfig holds extra parameters to trace functions.

debug.title: debug can be used to print output during capture end

enable_return_data.title: enable_return_data switches the capture of return data

limit.title: limit defines the maximum length of output, but zero means unlimited

overrides.title: overrides can be used to execute a trace using future fork rules

reexec.title: reexec defines the number of blocks the tracer is willing to go back

timeout.title:
timeout overrides the default timeout of 5 seconds for JavaScript-based
tracing calls

tracer.title: tracer is a custom javascript tracer

tracer_json_config.title: tracer_json_config configures the tracer using a JSON string

cosmwasm.wasm.v1.AbsoluteTxPosition.description:
AbsoluteTxPosition is a unique transaction position that allows for global
ordering of transactions.

block_height.title: BlockHeight is the block the contract was created at

tx_index.title:
TxIndex is a monotonic counter within the block (actual transaction index,
or gas consumed)

cosmwasm.wasm.v1.AccessType.description:
- ACCESS_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: AccessTypeUnspecified placeholder for empty value
 - ACCESS_TYPE_NOBODY: AccessTypeNobody forbidden
 - ACCESS_TYPE_EVERYBODY: AccessTypeEverybody unrestricted
 - ACCESS_TYPE_ANY_OF_ADDRESSES: AccessTypeAnyOfAddresses allow any of the addresses
cosmwasm.wasm.v1.AccessType.title: AccessType permission types

cosmwasm.wasm.v1.CodeInfoResponse.title: CodeInfoResponse contains code meta data from CodeInfo

code_id.title: CodeID is the reference to the stored WASM code

updated.description: Updated Tx position when the operation was executed.

cosmwasm.wasm.v1.ContractCodeHistoryOper.description:
- CONTRACT_CODE_HISTORY_OPERATION_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: ContractCodeHistoryOperationTypeUnspecified placeholder for empty value
 - CONTRACT_CODE_HISTORY_OPERATION_TYPE_INIT: ContractCodeHistoryOperationTypeInit on chain contract instantiation
 - CONTRACT_CODE_HISTORY_OPERATION_TYPE_MIGRATE: ContractCodeHistoryOperationTypeMigrate code migration
 - CONTRACT_CODE_HISTORY_OPERATION_TYPE_GENESIS: ContractCodeHistoryOperationTypeGenesis based on genesis data
cosmwasm.wasm.v1.ContractCodeHistoryOper.title: ContractCodeHistoryOperationType actions that caused a code change

cosmwasm.wasm.v1.ContractInfo.title: ContractInfo stores a WASM contract instance

admin.title: Admin is an optional address that can execute migrations

code_id.title: CodeID is the reference to the stored Wasm code

created.description: Created Tx position when the contract was instantiated.

creator.title: Creator address who initially instantiated the contract

extension.description:
Extension is an extension point to store custom metadata within the
persistence model.

label.description: Label is optional metadata to be stored with a contract instance.

cosmwasm.wasm.v1.Model.title: Model is a struct that holds a KV pair

key.title: hex-encode key to read it better (this is often ascii)

cosmwasm.wasm.v1.MsgAddCodeUploadParamsA.description:
MsgAddCodeUploadParamsAddresses is the
MsgAddCodeUploadParamsAddresses request type.

authority.description: Authority is the address of the governance account.

cosmwasm.wasm.v1.MsgAddCodeUploadParamsA.description:
MsgAddCodeUploadParamsAddressesResponse defines the response
structure for executing a MsgAddCodeUploadParamsAddresses message.

cosmwasm.wasm.v1.MsgClearAdmin.title: MsgClearAdmin removes any admin stored for a smart contract

contract.title: Contract is the address of the smart contract

sender.title: Sender is the actor that signed the messages

cosmwasm.wasm.v1.MsgExecuteContract.title: MsgExecuteContract submits the given message data to a smart contract

contract.title: Contract is the address of the smart contract

funds.title: Funds coins that are transferred to the contract on execution

msg.title: Msg json encoded message to be passed to the contract

sender.title: Sender is the that actor that signed the messages

data.title: Data contains bytes to returned from the contract

cosmwasm.wasm.v1.MsgInstantiateContract.description:
MsgInstantiateContract create a new smart contract instance for the given
code id.

admin.title: Admin is an optional address that can execute migrations

code_id.title: CodeID is the reference to the stored WASM code

funds.title: Funds coins that are transferred to the contract on instantiation

label.description: Label is optional metadata to be stored with a contract instance.

msg.title: Msg json encoded message to be passed to the contract on instantiation

sender.title: Sender is the that actor that signed the messages

cosmwasm.wasm.v1.MsgInstantiateContract2.description:
MsgInstantiateContract2 create a new smart contract instance for the given
code id with a predictable address.

admin.title: Admin is an optional address that can execute migrations

code_id.title: CodeID is the reference to the stored WASM code

fix_msg.title:
FixMsg include the msg value into the hash for the predictable address.
Default is false

funds.title: Funds coins that are transferred to the contract on instantiation

label.description: Label is optional metadata to be stored with a contract instance.

msg.title: Msg json encoded message to be passed to the contract on instantiation

salt.description: Salt is an arbitrary value provided by the sender. Size can be 1 to 64.

sender.title: Sender is the that actor that signed the messages

address.description: Address is the bech32 address of the new contract instance.

data.title: Data contains bytes to returned from the contract

address.description: Address is the bech32 address of the new contract instance.

data.title: Data contains bytes to returned from the contract

cosmwasm.wasm.v1.MsgMigrateContract.title: MsgMigrateContract runs a code upgrade/ downgrade for a smart contract

code_id.title: CodeID references the new WASM code

contract.title: Contract is the address of the smart contract

msg.title: Msg json encoded message to be passed to the contract on migration

sender.title: Sender is the that actor that signed the messages

cosmwasm.wasm.v1.MsgMigrateContractRespo.description: MsgMigrateContractResponse returns contract migration result data.

data.title:
Data contains same raw bytes returned as data from the wasm contract.
(May be empty)

cosmwasm.wasm.v1.MsgPinCodes.description:
MsgPinCodes is the MsgPinCodes request type.

Since: 0.40

authority.description: Authority is the address of the governance account.

code_ids.title: CodeIDs references the new WASM codes

cosmwasm.wasm.v1.MsgPinCodesResponse.description:
MsgPinCodesResponse defines the response structure for executing a
MsgPinCodes message.

Since: 0.40

cosmwasm.wasm.v1.MsgStoreAndInstantiateC.description:
MsgStoreAndInstantiateContract is the MsgStoreAndInstantiateContract
request type.

admin.title: Admin is an optional address that can execute migrations

authority.description: Authority is the address of the governance account.

builder.title:
Builder is the docker image used to build the code deterministically, used
for smart contract verification

code_hash.title:
CodeHash is the SHA256 sum of the code outputted by builder, used for smart
contract verification

funds.title:
Funds coins that are transferred from the authority account to the contract
on instantiation

instantiate_permission.title: InstantiatePermission to apply on contract creation, optional

label.description: Label is optional metadata to be stored with a contract instance.

msg.title: Msg json encoded message to be passed to the contract on instantiation

source.title: Source is the URL where the code is hosted

unpin_code.description:
UnpinCode code on upload, optional. As default the uploaded contract is
pinned to cache.

wasm_byte_code.title: WASMByteCode can be raw or gzip compressed

MsgUpdateParams is the MsgUpdateParams request type.

Since: 0.40

authority.description: Authority is the address of the governance account.

params defines the x/wasm parameters to update.

NOTE: All parameters must be supplied.

cosmwasm.wasm.v1.QueryWasmLimitsConfigRe.description:
QueryWasmLimitsConfigResponse is the response type for the
Query/WasmLimitsConfig RPC method. It contains the JSON encoded limits for
static validation of Wasm files.

nimochain.nimochain.v1.MsgUpdateParams.description: MsgUpdateParams is the Msg/UpdateParams request type.

authority.description: authority is the address that controls the module (defaults to x/gov unless overwritten).

params defines the module parameters to update.

NOTE: All parameters must be supplied.
